title: Week Review: Short Story Completion
goal: Complete your short story and review the week.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

All 8 vocabulary words:

sun → ?        moon → ?
star → ?       sky → ?
land → ?       island → ?
lake → ?       snow → ?

(Answers: solri, lunra, tarci, tsani, tumla, daplu, lalxu, snime)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

Storytelling Tools

Tool Use
.i ba bo Sequential events
pu ki Sticky past tense
lu...li'u Direct speech
lo se du'u Indirect speech
Attitudinals Character feelings
Tanru Vivid descriptions

Week 28 Vocabulary

Lojban English Lojban English
solri sun lunra moon
tarci star tsani sky
tumla land daplu island
lalxu lake snime snow

Complete Your Story (7-8 min)

Story Completion

Finish your story from yesterday. Target: 100+ total words.

Include:

  • Resolution/ending
  • At least one more dialogue
  • Final feeling/state
Example Complete Story 
.i pu ki la .tam. xabju ne'a lo cmana
.i ro cerni ri cadzu bu'u lo foldi
.i lo djedi cu lenku je snime
.i la .tam. viska lo mlatu poi cmalu je blabi
.i ri cusku lu .ue do ma zvati li'u
.i lo mlatu cu spuda lu mi se claxu lo zdani li'u
.i la .tam. cusku lu ko kansa mi li'u

.i ba bo la .tam. .e lo mlatu cu klama lo zdani
.i lo zdani cu glare je pluka
.i la .tam. dunda lo cidja lo mlatu
.i lo mlatu cu cusku lu ki'e .i do xamgu prenu li'u
.i la .tam. spuda lu mi gleki lo nu sidju do li'u

.i lo mlatu cu stali ne'a la .tam.
.i ri pendo
.i la .tam. cusku lu mi ba cmene do zo .snobla. li'u
.i lo mlatu cu cusku lu .ui mi nelci li'u
.i ze'u ri kansa la .tam.
.i ro da gleki

(Tom lived near a mountain. Every morning he walked in the field. The day was cold and snowy. Tom saw a cat which was small and white. He said "Wow, where are you?" The cat replied "I'm missing a home." Tom said "Come with me."

Then Tom and the cat went to the house. The house was warm and pleasant. Tom gave food to the cat. The cat said "Thanks, you're a good person." Tom replied "I'm happy to help you."

The cat stayed with Tom. They were friends. Tom said "I will name you 'Snobla' (Snow-white)." The cat said "Yay, I like it!" For a long time they were together. Everyone was happy.)

Self-Test (3-4 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (4 points)

Translate:

  1. solri →
  2. tsani →
  3. lake →
  4. snow →
Answers
  1. sun
  2. sky
  3. lalxu
  4. snime

Part B: Storytelling Tools (4 points)

What does each do?

  1. .i ba bo →
  2. pu ki →
  3. lu...li'u →
  4. lo se du'u →
Answers
  1. Sequential (and then)
  2. Sticky past tense
  3. Direct quote
  4. Indirect speech

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Read your completed story aloud.

Check:

  • Consistent tenses
  • Clear dialogue
  • Natural flow
  • Complete plot
